FuncDef: The display cfm default md command displays information about the default MD.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you run the cfm default md command to create a default MD, run the display cfm default md command to view information about the default MD. The information includes the level of the default MD, MIP generation rule, sender ID TLV type, and VLAN list associated with the default MD.
Prerequisites
CFM has been globally enabled using the cfm enable command in the system view.
